column2: b'Shakugan no Shana: Friagne & Marianne no Naze Nani Shana! Nandemo Shitsumonbako! 2'
b'A series of short specials where Friagne and Marianne explain different terms from the second season of Shakugan no Shana. '
[b'Shakugan no Shana II (Second)', b'Shakugan no Shana: Friagne & Marianne no Naze Nani Shana! Nandemo Shitsumonbako!']
